description: Arduino library dependencies for Gardener Controller
note: This file is for documentation only. Arduino IDE requires manual library installation.

dependencies.name: M5Unified
dependencies.author: M5Stack
dependencies.purpose: M5Stack hardware abstraction (display, GPIO, power management)

dependencies.name: ESP Async WebServer
dependencies.author: ESP32Async
dependencies.note: Search 'ESP32Async/ESPAsyncWebServer' in Library Manager. Original me-no-dev library is archived and incompatible with ESP32 Arduino Core 3.0+

dependencies.name: ArduinoJson
dependencies.author: Benoit Blanchon
dependencies.important: Must use version 6.x - version 7.x breaks backward compatibility with StaticJsonDocument API
